## SitesOnUrlChangeRequest interface

The argument passed to an onUrlChange type plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SitesOnUrlChangeRequest
```

## Properties

| Property                                                      | Modifiers | Type                                                                                      | Description                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| [domainMap](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.domainmap.md)     |           | { production: string; staging: string; deployPreview: string; displayUrlPrefix: string; } | The domains the site is hosted on.                     |
| [entityId](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.entityid.md)       |           | string                                                                                    | The entity's ID.                                       |
| [feature](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.feature.md)         |           | string                                                                                    | The name of the feature.                               |
| [locale](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.locale.md)           |           | string                                                                                    | The entity's locale                                    |
| [path](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.path.md)               |           | string                                                                                    | The entity's path.                                     |
| [previousUrl](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.previousurl.md) |           | string                                                                                    | The entity's old URL.                                  |
| [site](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.site.md)               |           | [Site](./pages.site.md)                                                                   | Site object containing all deploy-related information. |
| [url](./pages.sitesonurlchangerequest.url.md)                 |           | string                                                                                    | The entity's new URL.                                  |
